description: System-generated unique identifier for an asset location record; primary key used for joins and referential integrity.
Operational location code used to identify a yard, site, or region in business processes and user interfaces.
Human-readable name or address describing the location for display and reporting.
Free-text notes about the location, such as directions, access restrictions, or special handling.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this location record.
Likely timestamp of the last user-driven change to this record; appears to duplicate last_modified; confirm with SME.
User or service account that created this location record.
Timestamp when the location record was created.
User or service account that last modified this location record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this location record.
